item.description:
What's an interesting issue we'll discuss?We will again be discussing and addressing each persons interests and concerns,with emphasis on how to find answers to your ?s

Who should come? Are newcomers welcome?Open to all those interested in R.E.Investing,newcomers and veterans.

Why should people come?We all share experiences and help each other,especially by comparing our observations of the tremendous variety of materials to learn from(without being taken/exploited).

Do attendees need to participate or can they just listen?Everyone is free to speak or just listen,ther is something to be learned in both cases.

How will members find you when they get there?Just ask the hostess.
item.name: 2nd Meeting(can we top the 1st???)
